Chapter Previous Next

class gstLineBase

Base class for all types of lines passing through space (ie. Ray, line segment...).

From header file: gstLineBase.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstLineBaseLine is directed along v1.
gstLineBaseConstructor defines line as passing through points p1 and p2.
gstLineBaseConstructor defines line passing through p1 and directed along v1.
~gstLineBase
Virtual Functions
directionGstVector directed along line in the direction of v1 or toward p2 depending on constructor used.
evalEvaluates parametric form of line at t and returns point at f(t).
getPointOnLineReturns a point on the line.
projectProjects a point onto the line and returns the projected point on the line.
unitDirectionGstVector directed along line in the direction of v1 or toward p2 depending on constructor used.
